entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
